Text: I encourage all Tarpley fans to visit his revamped website: Tarpley.net . There you can find his newest articles as they're written, articles spanning back several years, as well as many hours of video of his interviews, lectures, and speeches. There is also a "World Crisis Radio" section. Thanks for your torrents Lordmichael.
Thanks ludwignosen, tarpley.net looks great and I'll visit regularly!
